nodes.text: Angel Unzueta (born May 7, 1969) is a Spanish comic book artist who was, along with Phil Noto, one of the primary artists for Marvel Comics' Poe Dameron series.

StarWars.com announced on September 15, 2015 that he would pencil Star Wars Annual 1, written by Kieron Gillen. He also contributed to two issues of the Shattered Empire miniseries by drawing the Naboo storyline. He provided art for the seventh issue of the Poe Dameron series, and has drawn every numbered issue since issue 14.
Unzueta's work also includes issues of Marvel's Cable and X-Force and Captain America: Sam Wilson series', as well as DC Comics' Titans and Green Lantern Corps.
